pages.text: The Undying Flesh mutation grants the Maw an eternal form. It completely arrests the process of decay, removing the constraint of durability and rendering the vessel truly unbreakable.
Upon reaching the zenith of the Excelsior Stage, this invulnerability evolves further: the Maw becomes impervious to flame and lava, rivaling the legendary resilience of Netherite.

Instability (Fatigue): Immortality is not a shield against exhaustion. Even an eternal beast may grow weary of its constant labors. At times, the Maw will succumb to a deep, stubborn lethargy, refusing to respond to your commands until its spirit has rested.
